pendingTalk.text: Do not try to attack me, for I do not have a body...
You might have heard of me...
I am Cyril! Cyril the vanished! Previously known as the devastator...
But that was before your time. So, I'm not going to bore you with history.
I guess you were looking for Blozard, where you?
I'm not completely done with him, you know?
Blozard is much more powerful than Granner, and brinhing him back to full force takes time...
But it doesn't matter to you. This is as far as you get.
For, these doors can only be open by me...
By the time that they open, Blozard will be far too strong for you!
How could you?! How dare you?! Who are you!
But this is not the end...

message.text: There is something written in it, some kind of runes...

addTopic.text: Do you know what this is?

talk.text: I am sorry, I do not know anything about that.
I though I had dismissed you already...
